entry.def: Asceticism is a simple, strict way of life with no luxuries or physical pleasures.

means.word_mean: 1. the doctrine that through renunciation of worldly pleasures it is possible to achieve a high spiritual or intellectual state
2. the trait of great self-denial (especially refraining from worldly pleasures)
